8A7CA33240804B929ECC4C99F0502FBA.listId: ESCHATOLOGY – The doctrine of end times
8A7CA33240804B929ECC4C99F0502FBA.description:
140. What happens to the righteous when they die?
The righteous go to heaven (Matthew 5:11–12; 25:46; John 10:28).

BB78DA42415D43F49B78F2082E7FB2C7.listId: ESCHATOLOGY – The doctrine of end times
BB78DA42415D43F49B78F2082E7FB2C7.description:
139. What will happen to the wicked when they die?
The wicked will be thrown into the lake of fire (Revelation 20:11–15).

B01E675990DA485591DE5FCB02290890.listId: ESCHATOLOGY – The doctrine of end times
B01E675990DA485591DE5FCB02290890.description:
138. What happens to people at death?
The body returns to dust, and the spirit goes to either heaven or hell (Genesis 3:19; Psalm 9:17; Luke 16:22–23; Romans 6:23).

29CFEC3306564751B85F9D6AAF5EB3F8.listId: ESCHATOLOGY – The doctrine of end times
29CFEC3306564751B85F9D6AAF5EB3F8.description:
137. What will happen after the Millennium?
At the end of the Millennium, Christ will judge His enemies and establish the new earth and the new Jerusalem (Revelation 20:7–15; 21:1–4).

62879C0EBE104119BA37CC40276C0C96.listId: ESCHATOLOGY – The doctrine of end times
62879C0EBE104119BA37CC40276C0C96.description:
136. What is the Millennium?
The millennium is a thousand-year period of Christ’s rule on earth (Revelation 20:1–6).

89297EC15B8946E5BD23910A55E17AF3.listId: ESCHATOLOGY – The doctrine of end times
89297EC15B8946E5BD23910A55E17AF3.description:
135. What will happen at the glorious appearing?
Christ will return to earth, remove the wicked, and establish His millennial kingdom (2 Thessalonians 1:7–10; Revelation 19:11–16).

19E98B0071874055AAEB8A7F6F58EC4D.listId: ESCHATOLOGY – The doctrine of end times
19E98B0071874055AAEB8A7F6F58EC4D.description:
134. What will happen after the Rapture?
After the Rapture, a seven-year period of judgment will take place on earth, ending with the glorious appearing.

61B3920C53064DF18254EF8A2CFC5E8C.listId: ESCHATOLOGY – The doctrine of end times
61B3920C53064DF18254EF8A2CFC5E8C.description:
133. What will happen at the Rapture?
At the Rapture, Christ will resurrect the Christians who have died and change those who are living, giving each of them a body that will never die (1 Corinthians 15:51–52; 1 Thessalonians 4:15–17).

B5E2A89499A54B7B8FB1370108CDD97A.listId: ESCHATOLOGY – The doctrine of end times
B5E2A89499A54B7B8FB1370108CDD97A.description:
132. What are the two parts of the Second Coming?
The Second Coming includes the Rapture and the glorious appearing (1 Corinthians 15:51–52; Revelation 19:11–16).

B4AE6B26BB144840B2B846E8231EC928.listId: ESCHATOLOGY – The doctrine of end times
B4AE6B26BB144840B2B846E8231EC928.description:
131. When will Christ return?
No one knows the day or hour of His return (Matthew 24:42, 50; 25:13).

B19491F08D8D444DBEFCBCB25D0E2979.listId: ESCHATOLOGY – The doctrine of end times
B19491F08D8D444DBEFCBCB25D0E2979.description:
130. Will Christ come again?
Yes, Jesus promised to return (John 14:1–3; Acts 1:11).
